summary:
Re-texture from scratch. Waiting for \"Cabal\"s version, although it will take a while.
So i did it myself.
descriptionHtml:
I am well aware that this still has the \"green gleam\" effect. Simply Delete any files that has an ending with \"_M\" in your textures directory.
Textures>Armor>Glass
example. Gloves_m.dds
Deleting these files deletes my version of the environment map, and uses Vanillas.
Also, After i am done with my Daedric, i will probably fine tune this because it was my first noob mod. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 2.0
- Better Normal Map
- Better Specual Map
(Doesn\'t look like rock armor now)

Texture Replacer for Glass Armor

This is just a re-texture from scratch
Resolution: 2048 x 2048
Female/Male Retexture
Permission: I don\'t care, credit me if you use :]
Goal: Clean it up as time goes by.

Used photoshop and a crap tablet

Female Mod:
MAK\'s CBBEv3 Remodel (The Mesh)
Install:
NMM
OR put it into Data>Textures>Armor>Glass


If you like. Please Endorse me. It will Greatly Motivate me to ReTexture Weapons and shield. Also it lets me know if you like it or not.
author: Glorious
